alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 13 at 4:00PM EDT until October 14 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 10 to 20 mph with gusts 45 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Northern New London and Southern New London Counties. In New York, Northeast Suffolk and Southeast Suffolk Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM EDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest wind gusts will be likely associated with heavy rain showers.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
